channel.title: Radio Havana Cuba on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Radio Havana Cuba on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Listening to Radio Havana Cuba via a shortwave software defined radio
item.description: I’m listening to Radio Havana Cuba via a shortwave listening post set up with a software defined radio. The system, Great Lakes Listening Post, has four separate radios covering the 80, 40, 30, and 20 meter bands, all fed into the WebSDR software from PA3FWM. It’s located in Michigan, and thus approximates the radio reception I’d get from my own receiver. R Havana Cuba is a good station to listen to.
